title: Sakala Beach Club Relaxation (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy beachfront dining, the infinity pool, and live music at Sakala Beach Club.

stops.description: Enjoy the infinity pool and beachfront bar.

title: Sakala Beach Club Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of relaxation, dining, and poolside fun at Sakala Beach Club.

stops.description: Start your day with a swim in the infinity pool.
Lunch with a view of the ocean.
Enjoy beach loungers, live music, and bar service.
